title: Ticket #4082: CondorTest.pm
description:
In CondorTest.pm, in the function AddRunningTest, around line 2969 is the line: 

  open(OUT, '>', '$runningfile/$test');

That will try to open a file called literally $runningfile/$test, which is pretty much doomed to failure. The single quotes around the filename should be double quotes so interpolation works: 

  open(OUT, '>', "$runningfile/$test");

Clearly this is broken. It looks like it's been broken since 2012-06-27. Conclusion, no one cares.

Either fix it (per above). Or perhaps tear it out as useless. bt may have thoughts on the value of this feature.
